```{r setup, include=FALSE}
download.file(url = "https://registrar.fas.harvard.edu/files/fas-registrar/files/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_3.22.19.xlsx", destfile = "spring_2019", mode = "wb")

  filter(! is.na(course_name))

download.file(url = "https://registrar.fas.harvard.edu/files/fas-registrar/files/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_03.06.18.xlsx", destfile = "spring_2018", mode = "wb")

s2018 <- read_excel("spring_2018", skip = 3) %>%

download.file(url = "http://registrar.fas.harvard.edu/files/fas-registrar/files/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_2017_03_07_final_0.xlsx", destfile = "spring_2017", mode = "wb")

s2017 <- read_excel("spring_2017", skip = 3) %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(! is.na(course_name))

```


```{r}

all <- list(s2019, s2018) %>% 
  reduce(inner_join, by = "course_id") %>% 
  select(course_name.x, course_title.x, course_department.x, u_grad.x, u_grad.y, instructor_full_name.x, instructor_full_name.y)

prof_changed <-
  all %>% 
  filter(instructor_full_name.x != instructor_full_name.y, u_grad.x > 0, u_grad.y > 0) %>% 
  mutate(difference = u_grad.x - u_grad.y) %>% 
  arrange(desc(difference)) %>% 
  filter(difference < 75) %>% 
  select(course_name.x, instructor_full_name.x, instructor_full_name.y, difference, u_grad.x, u_grad.y, course_department.x) %>% 
  filter(course_name.x != "Expository Writing 20") 

prof_changed  

prof_changed %>%
  #filter(course_department.x %in% c("Near Eastern Languages & Civ", "Economics", "East Asian Langs& Civ", "Mathematics", "Philosophy", "Linguistics", "Psychology", "Physics", "Government", "Economics")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = course_name.x, y = difference, fill = course_department.x), stat = "identity") +
  facet_grid(~ course_department.x) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic() +
  theme_set(theme_wsj()) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = rel(0.5)), plot.caption = element_text(size = rel(0.25))) +
  labs(title = "Difference in Course Enrollment \n Following a Change in Professor \n Comparison of Spring 2018 and Spring 2019", 
       caption = "Data from the Harvard Registrar") +
  xlab("Enrollment Margin") +
  ylab("Course Name")

  
  

```
